description: The due diligence is for multiple acquirement of information
full_summary:
**Tender Notification**
=====================

**Solicitation No.**: WS4413611224
**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement

**Bid Description**: 
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) invites qualified Vendors to submit proposals for Subscription Agent Services. The successful contractor will be responsible for acquiring subscriptions to various publications, delivering, managing and supporting these subscriptions, and providing access to the Electronic Resource Management Platform. The anticipated start date is February 2024, with a proposed contract period of one year, plus two option periods.

**Bidder Information**
--------------------

Only contractors who are already holders of a Supply Arrangement (SA) number E60PI-23AGNT-B are invited to participate in this bid. This includes EBSCO Canada LTD.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For further information regarding this bid, please contact:

* Matthew Curran, Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Email: [matthew.curran@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:matthew.curran@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: N/A
* Fax: N/A

**Submission Requirements**
-------------------------

All bid submissions must be received by 14:00 EST on February 22, 2024. Bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

**Related Documents**
---------------------

The Supply Arrangement E60PI-23AGNT-B is incorporated by reference and forms part of this RFP. 

**Procurement Details**
-----------------------

* Procurement Method: Competitive-Selective Tendering
* Expected Contract Start Date: February 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: None
* UNSPSC Code: 81111900 (Information Retrieval Systems)
* G/SIN: N/A
* Regions of Delivery: Canada
* Language Code: N/A
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

 There is no space for inadvertent errors in our team. 
Please review and correct me if I have done anything wrong. Thank you!  I will make any changes you need. 

Best,
